mods.abstract: The student presidents of the Maurelian and Rozier dorm committees addressed Brother Philip Morgan, Dean of Men, about visiting hours for women in the men's dorms.
mods.accessCondition: While CBU may house an item, it does not necessarily hold the copyright on the item, nor may it be able to determine if the item is still protected under copyright law.
